page.title: 11CHURCH STRETTON PARK
page.content: The{park}is positioned at the bottom of the main shopping street, and also on the corner of the traffic lights, inviting many weary shoppers on foot. Its many sporting facilities attract people to have a go. Inside this recreation area there are tennis{courts}with equipment for tennis and{mini-golf}next to them. The golf course is behind the hut. They also have {bowls}to play and a children's playground with{swings,}a {slide,}a{seesaw,}a{roundabout}and also a{skating area}for roller skating and roller booting and skateboarding. Also there are nice{gardens}filled with{birds.}There are plenty of seats. { }
